title: Clayton Blommetjies
text:
Clayton Anthony Blommetjies (born 30 August 1990) is a South African <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player for the in the <a href="Pro14">Pro14</a> and the in the <a href="Currie%20Cup">Currie Cup</a>. His usual position is either <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%23Full-back">full-back</a> or <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%23Wing">wing</a>.
Career.
After representing <a href="Boland%20Cavaliers">Boland Cavaliers</a> at youth level, he joined the <a href="Blue%20Bulls">Blue Bulls</a> in 2009.
Blommetjies has made a total of 26 appearances in the <a href="Vodacom%20Cup">Vodacom Cup</a> and made his <a href="Currie%20Cup">Currie Cup</a> debut in the opening match of the <a href="2012%20Currie%20Cup%20Premier%20Division">2012 Currie Cup Premier Division</a> against <a href="Griquas%20%28rugby%29">Griquas</a>.
Blommetjies has also represented <a href="TUKS%20Rugby%20League">UP Tuks</a> in the <a href="Varsity%20Cup">Varsity Cup</a> since 2009.
Blommetjies signed a deal with <a href="Bloemfontein">Bloemfontein</a>-based side the <a href="Free%20State%20Cheetahs">Free State Cheetahs</a> to join them starting 1 August 2014.
In 2018 Blommetjies had participated in the <a href="Pro14">Guinness PRO14</a> against <a href="Ulster">Ulster</a> but since then had disappeared from public view.
On 9 April 2019 Blommetjies joined <a href="Leicester%20Tigers">Leicester Tigers</a> in England's <a href="Premiership%20Rugby">Premiership Rugby</a> competition on loan. After appearing twice for the club he returned to Scarlets.
